entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 8:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: N 35 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
